meanings.sent1: The ineffectualness of the old machine led to its replacement.
meanings.sent2: The team's ineffectualness in scoring goals cost them the match.
meanings.sent3: The ineffectualness of the broken umbrella made it useless in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her ineffectualness in solving the puzzle left her frustrated.
meanings.sent5: The ineffectualness of the flashlight's dim light left them stumbling in the dark.

meanings.definition: Inability to produce the desired result.
meanings.sent1: His ineffectualness in following instructions resulted in a failed experiment.
meanings.sent2: The ineffectualness of the plan became evident when it fell apart.
meanings.sent3: The ineffectualness of the chef's attempt at baking a cake was comical.
meanings.sent4: The ineffectualness of the lock left the door easily accessible.
meanings.sent5: The ineffectualness of the student's studying habits led to poor grades.

meanings.sent1: The ineffectualness treatment did not cure the illness.
meanings.sent2: Her ineffectualness efforts to fix the leaky faucet only made it worse.
meanings.sent3: The ineffectualness alarm clock failed to wake him up on time.
meanings.sent4: The ineffectualness plan to increase sales did not yield any results.
meanings.sent5: The ineffectualness attempt to repair the bridge left it unsafe for crossing.
